content: rainbow dress - by emily keenan simple crocheted dress in us terms rainbow dress age 2-3 3-5 6-8 i used drops paris cottom aran and a 4 5mm hook stitches needed us terms fsc - foundation single_crochet youtube has some fab tutorials well worth learning you mustn t substitute with chaining plus a row of single_crochet because it won t stretch over the child s head double_crochet - double_crochet chain - chain slip_stitch - slipstitch yarn colours specified in this pattern are for the age 3-5 dress pictured red at the top the age 6-8 dress was made with colours reversed the age 2-3 dress was made by doing half the required number of row in the bright colours and the remaining row in white except for on the last colour where the white wasn t used so only half the row purple row were completed using red yarn red row 1 - 74 78 78 fsc join to first fsc with a slip_stitch ensure it fits over child s head red row 2 - ch3 always counts as double_crochet double_crochet into next 9 9 9 st double_crochet-ch2- double_crochet in next st double_crochet into next 17 18 18 st double_crochet-ch2-double_crochet double_crochet into next 18 19 19 st double_crochet-ch2-double_crochet double_crochet into next 17 18 18 st double_crochet-ch2-double_crochet double_crochet into next 8 9 9 st slip_stitch to top of ch3 red row 3 - ch3 double_crochet into each st double_crochet-ch2-double_crochet in each ch2 space repeat row 3 4 4 7 more times fasten_off join orange yarn in centre of back of dress orange row 1 - working in blo for the entire row ch3 to start then double_crochet in each stitch until 2 stitches before the first ch2 space in the stitch before the ch2 space yarn over and insert hook into the st and also through the stitch after the 2nd ch2 space then finish your double_crochet stitch… this creates a sleeve opening double_crochet in each double_crochet until 2 st before the 3rd ch2 space and work another double_crochet through both the st before the 3rd ch2 space and the st after the 4th ch2 space to create the 2nd sleeve opening double_crochet to the end orange row 2 - ch3 to start 1 double_crochet in same st as ch3 then 2 double_crochet in each stitch around orange row 3 - ch3 to start then 1 double_crochet in each stitch repeat row 3 3 3 5 more times fasten_off join yellow yarn in centre of back of dress yellow row 1 - work in blo ch3 to start then 1 double_crochet in each st yellow row 2 - ch3 to start then 1 double_crochet in each st repeat row 2 4 4 6 more times fasten_off repeat yellow row for green blue & purple yarn or change colour patterns as desired
